text.section:
An abatement order directed to the occupant of the premises shall be served within 5 days after the order is issued:
by delivering a true copy of the order to the occupant or to an adult who is apparently in charge of the premises; or
if no occupant or adult is found on the premises:
by posting a true copy of the order in a conspicuous place on the door or other prominent entrance to the premises; and

An abatement order directed to the owner of the premises shall be served within 5 days after the order is issued:
by delivering a true copy of the order to the owner; or
if the owner is absent from the State or the owner's whereabouts are unknown to the State Fire Marshal:
by posting a true copy of the order in a conspicuous place on the door or other prominent entrance to the premises; and
